---
title: "Bayesian Modeling"
format: html
---

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(brms)

# Convert variables to factors for modeling
data$race <- as.factor(data$race)
data$sex <- as.factor(data$sex)
data$income <- ifelse(data$income == "<=50K", 0, 1)

# Fit the Bayesian model
fit_income <- brm(
  formula = income ~ race + sex, 
  data = data, 
  family = bernoulli(), 
  refresh = 0, 
  silent = 2, 
  seed = 9
)

# Show the fixed effects
fixef(fit_income)
```
